Sorry!

The URL is http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues/#issue/37 (can t=
he issue number change? I have memories of this being number 41). The title=
 is: Feature request: Making test suites less tedious.

On a side note: thi=
s does not allow for direct inheritance like in the categories, but for a c=
ombination of tests and suites, which, IMHO, achieves the same flexibility.=


Cheers,
  Georg
